sentences.en: A thin cover of skin, called the scalp, covers most of the cranium.
sentences.cn: 而头皮, 即一层薄薄的皮肤, 则覆盖在头盖骨之上.

sentences.en: Conclusion: CT scanning is of remarkable referent value and significance in diagnosing cranium facial osteofibrom hyperplasy.
sentences.cn: 结论: CT对颅面骨骨纤维异常增殖症的诊断具有重要参考价值.

sentences.en: Cranial and cephalic are interchangeable adjectives which mean proceeding toward the brain and cranium.
sentences.cn: 颅侧和头为可互换使用的形容词,意为向脑或头颅的一侧.

sentences.en: Craniofacial: Of or involving both the cranium and the face.
sentences.cn: 颅面的: 属于颅骨和脸面的或与颅骨和脸面有关的.

sentences.en: I'll just store your data in my cranium until we can solve this stupid mystery.
sentences.cn: 我只是想把你的数据储存在我脑里直到解决了这件神秘的事情为止.

sentences.en: In Beijing a man with a golden gun steals the cranium bones of China's only fossil.
sentences.cn: 中国最大的恐龙头骨被偷运到港,当局派特务007侦查劫匪金枪客及截回头骨.

sentences.en: It has a jaw that is hinged at the cranium and has bony, meaty, jointed fins.
sentences.cn: 它的下颚直接铰接在头骨上,还有多骨的, 有肉的 、 有接缝的鳍.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe the therapeutic effect of 1,6 diphosphate fructose ( 1, 6 - FDP ) on cranium - brain injury ( CBI ) .
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察1, 6- 二磷酸 果糖 治疗重型颅脑损伤的效果.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the operation effect of simple awl cranium drainage in treating chronic subdural hematoma.
sentences.cn: 目的　探讨单纯锥颅引流治疗慢性硬膜下血肿手术疗效.

sentences.en: Objective To study absorbed mechanism of free bone auto - graft in cranium.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨颅顶部自体骨游离移植被吸收的内在机制.

sentences.en: Objectives : To probe into the value in diagnosing cranium facial osteofibrom hyperplasia with CT.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨CT对颅面骨骨纤维增殖症的诊断价值.

sentences.en: T 4 stage involved the skull bases and into cranium in 28 cases.
sentences.cn: T4期(向上侵及颅底、颅内)28例.

sentences.en: The brain itself does not fossilise, but the inside of the cranium retains an impression of its contours.
sentences.cn: 脑部分本身是不会变成化石的，但在头盖骨内部却还保留着脑的轮廓。

sentences.en: The skull should be fairly long, slightly domed at occiput, with cranium broad and full.
sentences.cn: 头部相对较长, 后枕骨略微圆拱, 头盖骨宽而丰满.

words.tran_cn: 有头盖的；有头动物的；脊椎动物的

trans.tran_en: the part of your head that is made of bone and covers your brain
